message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the value I can get from the product.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer but I'm not comfortable going that low.  I'm willing to meet you halfway at $13,000. This still gives you a significant gain while allowing me to get closer to the value I place on the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,500, but no higher. Can you consider this offer?
